about_the_game:
Note:


Users must sign up for Convai and create their Convai accounts.
Choose between the free or paid(The Gamer Plan) tiers:

[Free Plan]
・Provides 100 interactions per day.
・Conversations will be disabled once you exceed 100 interactions.
・Even if you use up all 100 interactions in a day, 100 interactions will be provided the next day.
・You can still enjoy plenty with the free plan.

[Gamer Plan]
・Provides 100 free interactions per day, plus an additional 4000 interactions per month.
・Monthly Plan: $9 / month
・Annual Plan: $6 / month

Game Introduction


Job Interview is a game that utilizes a generative AI voice conversation feature (voice dialogue AI) to simulate a real interview experience. It's perfect for those exploring new career paths, seeking to gain interview experience, or simply looking to improve their interview skills while having fun.
Practicing for an interview alone can be challenging, and finding a practice partner can be difficult. Even in a busy schedule, an interview simulation game using conversational AI allows you to effectively improve your interview skills on your own. Skip the hassle of finding a partner; the AI interviewer provides realistic interview scenarios and feedback.

Game Features

・Real-time Resume Creation

The game provides an original resume template. You can easily create a resume within the game. The interviewer will base their questions on your unique resume, reflecting your background, skills, qualifications, and personality, and proceed with the interview. While resume formats and designs vary by country, this game uses the format and design commonly used in the United States.

・Interactive Interviews

Within the game, you can accumulate interview experience through real conversations with interviewers. The AI understands players' responses and provides appropriate questions and feedback, offering an experience close to real interviews. Respond to interviewers' questions and highlight your experiences and skills.

・Speech and Outcome

The flow of conversation changes based on your statements and directly affects the outcome of the interview. Your actions determine the future of your career.

・Skill Improvement

Repeatedly simulating interviews improves your skills and allows you to gain experience. Prepare for real interviews.
It's also a good idea to challenge yourself with interviews in foreign languages!

・Controls

The supported devices are limited to mouse, keyboard, and microphone only.
Since conversing via typing input is also possible, you can play even without a microphone.

・Video Streaming Guidelines

You are free to stream videos, such as Let's Plays, on platforms like YouTube without needing permission, regardless of whether you are an individual or a corporation.
No separate permission requests are required, including for personal or corporate use and monetization.
Monetization is only possible if utilizing features provided by the video streaming platform.
We would appreciate it if you include the game's name in the title of your video or stream and provide a link to the Steam page in the description or elsewhere.
Furthermore, we do not assume any responsibility for any damages incurred due to the streaming of this game.
Please note that the contents of these guidelines are subject to change without prior notice.

With 『Job Interview』, step towards success while enjoying virtual interview experiences. The future is in your hands.
